dependencies.description:
Ensembl Variant Effect Predictor (VEP) determines the effect of your
variants (SNPs, insertions, deletions, CNVs or structural variants) on
genes, transcripts, and protein sequence, as well as regulatory regions.
(Requires addtional data available via the `vep-cache` package)
dependencies.name: vep

description:
Separate installation and management for the Ensembl Variant Effect
Predictor (vep)
name: vep-cache

variants.description: Which assembly of genome to use (only needed for homo sapiens)
variants.name: assembly

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Setup VEP environment variables for this cache
variants.name: env

variants.description: Add FASTA files to the cache
variants.name: fasta

variants.description: Which species to download the cache for (only one at a time)
variants.name: species
